questions.question: Who wrote the novel 'Pride and Prejudice'?
Which classic novel begins with the line, 'It was the best of times, it was the worst of times'?
In the novel 'To Kill a Mockingbird,' who is the lawyer defending Tom Robinson?
Who is the author of the novel '1984'?
Which classic novel tells the story of Pip and his journey from a blacksmith's apprentice to a gentleman?
What novel is known for the line, 'Call me Ishmael'?
incorrect_answers: The Old Man and the Sea

questions.question: Who wrote the novel 'Wuthering Heights'?

incorrect_answers: The Old Man and the Sea
